CustomField.formula: IF(AND(BEGINS(Owner.Profile.Name, 'USRS'), CONTAINS( Owner.UserRole.Name , 'Midstates')), "Midstates", IF(AND(BEGINS(Owner.Profile.Name, 'USRS'), CONTAINS( Owner.UserRole.Name , 'West')), "West", IF(AND(BEGINS(Owner.Profile.Name, 'USRS'), CONTAINS( Owner.UserRole.Name , 'North')), "North", IF(AND(BEGINS(Owner.Profile.Name, 'USRS'), CONTAINS( Owner.UserRole.Name , 'South')), "South", IF(AND(BEGINS(Owner.Profile.Name, 'USRS'), CONTAINS( Owner.UserRole.Name , 'Leetland')), "Leetland", IF(OR( TEXT(BillingCountryCode) = 'US', BEGINS(Owner.Profile.Name, 'USRS')), "US", ""))))))
CustomField.label: Account Owner Region
